Text:
Hej Realuploads.
hvordan kan det være du er begyndt at UL rar filer??
Ellers er det fedest med DK uploads!!
Takker

Du spreder flere filer ud. dvs at der altid vil være en, der har en fil, en anden ikke har. Så du behøver ikke altid vente på, at der kommer en med 100 % af 1 fil (mkv, avi, iso), før du får filen. Nemmere sagt hvis vi seeder til 20 personer, så kan person 1, ha hentet rar1, rar2, en anden person rar4, rar10, osv.

Greetings Realuploads
Hello, this is a nice film, I guess. But are there any English subtitles? I'd really love to watch it, but I don't speak any Nordic language.

I appreciate the effort, really.

But this rip is pure garbage.

The A/V quality is close to VHS, all the pre-Oscar screeners we have seen lately were much better quality.

The format is somewhere in between 4:3 and 16:9, resulting in black bars on all sides.

This can almost be fixed be setting VLC to play the file in 16:9, though it stretches the picture a tiny bit.

"Aint nobody got time for that!" :-)

I for sure will wait for the BDRIP, but again thank you for trying, and better luck next time.

@schnitzelburger

Sorry normally we only up in NORDIC or DK.
But you can try some places where they only upload subs and see if any have translatet the movie,

Realuploads

@pootidk

Takker for dit flotte engelske oplæg.

Vi er en ung gruppe af danske uploadere, der tester forskellige "encodere" osv. men hvis du er utilfreds, så er der sikkert andre "dk" uppere der gør det bedre end os herinde. 

Realuploads
